about.title: About me
about.name: My name is Uriel Rolando Palomares Elias
about.history: Starting my journey as a developer over 6 years ago, I have collaborated with talented people to create incredible digital products. I am naturally curious and perpetually working to improve my skills, one bug at a time..

news.title: Que esta pasando
news.description: News portal, through which we communicate what is happening in the world in recent days. It is content with trending-topic, filtered by sources.

IReportIt.title: Yo lo reporto
IReportIt.description: Incident portal, through which citizens can report any anomaly so that their corresponding authorities can address them.

talachapp.title: TalachAPP
talachapp.description: App where any player can keep records of the games played and in case of receiving any remuneration also be able to keep track.

heytu.title: HeyTu!
heytu.description: App where you can send messages by WhatsApp to anyone in the world without having to add them to your contacts.
